QuestData.Title: Ley Energies
QuestData.Description: The arcane remnant pulses with strange energy. Perhaps you should search for more remnants. Surely Dalar would be interested in such a find.
QuestData.RewardText: Smart $g boy:girl;! I can most definitely use these arcane remnants in my studies. Indeed, Dalaran was built upon a massive ley line. It's no wonder, then, that such things exist at the crater.
